scripts.front-end:lint: npx tslint -c tslint.json src/front-end/*.ts src/front-end/**/*.ts && echo Lint Successful
scripts.front-end:typecheck: npx tsc --project src/front-end/typescript --noEmit && echo Typecheck Successful
scripts.front-end:typedoc: npx typedoc --name 'Concierge Front-End' --tsconfig src/front-end/typescript/tsconfig.json --out typedoc/front-end src/front-end/typescript
scripts.back-end:lint: npx tslint -c tslint.json src/back-end/*.ts src/back-end/**/*.ts && echo Lint Successful
scripts.back-end:typecheck: npx tsc --project src/back-end && echo Typecheck Successful
scripts.back-end:start: cd src/back-end && npx ts-node --require tsconfig-paths/register --project tsconfig.json index.ts
scripts.back-end:watch: cd src/back-end && npx nodemon --watch . --watch ../shared --ext ts,tsx,json --exec "ts-node --require tsconfig-paths/register --project tsconfig.json index.ts"
scripts.back-end:typedoc: npx typedoc --name 'Concierge Back-End' --tsconfig src/back-end/tsconfig.json --out typedoc/back-end src/back-end
scripts.shared:typedoc: npx typedoc --name 'Concierge Shared' --tsconfig src/shared/tsconfig.json --out typedoc/shared src/shared
scripts.migrations:create: npx migrate --chdir migrations --template-file template.ts --migrations-dir migrations create
scripts.migrations:up: cd migrations && npx ts-node --require tsconfig-paths/register --project tsconfig.json index.ts --direction up
scripts.migrations:down: cd migrations && npx ts-node --require tsconfig-paths/register --project tsconfig.json index.ts --direction down
scripts.typedoc:build: npm run back-end:typedoc; npm run front-end:typedoc; npm run shared:typedoc
